title: The Olympics with Professor Mark Dyreson
itunes:title: The Olympics with Professor Mark Dyreson
description:
In this episode, the team covers the Olympics with the help of Professor Mark Dyreson.   Thanks to our sponsors Blue Chew (code Jim), Shipstation (code Jim), Babbel (code Jim), and Policy Genius.   Check out Mark's book, "Marking the American Team: Sport, Culture, and the Olympic Experience."   Follow Us:   Jim Jefferies Website: www.jimjefferies.com Jim Jefferies Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jimjefferies/?hl=en Jim Jefferies Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JimJefferies/ Jim Jefferies Twitter: https://twitter.com/jimjefferies Forrest Shaw Website: www.forrestshaw.net Forrest Shaw Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/forrestshaw/ Forrest Shaw Twitter: https://twitter.com/forrestshaw Kelly Blackheart Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kellyblackheart/   Jack Hackett Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Jack_hackett/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
